extendedInfo.description: A for "Alligator", B for "Bear", T for "Tiger", S for "Seal"! Wow!! The new version of Alpha Zoo is now released!âAlpha Zooâ is a popular memory game in the market to help kids promoting memory ability and learning letters and animals. With some new features, the upgraded version âAlpha Zoo 2â will bring little kids lots of fun and fun.#How to play:In the classic mode, your task is to match the same animals, while in the alpha mode the goal is to match the cute animals with their nameâs initial letters. To achieve the highest score, match the picture pairs as soon as possible. When kids press one card in the grid, a picture of animal or letter will appear, along with the sound made by the animal or the pronunciation of the letter. When the animal appears, its name will be shown on the bottom of the screen, which helps kids to learn the names of animals and match the corresponding initial letter.The theme will be changed after every mission completed. Global ranking is also involved! Hope you like this game. :D#Features:    -Learn words    -Good Musics & Pics    -Global Ranking    -Two funny modes to play    -Cool animation and sound.#Keywords:-Memory game!-Cute game!-Cool game!-Funny game!-Easy enough for kids-Great game for kids!!!
